commit.message:
Clean up verbose console.log statements

Removed non-essential logging from:
- voiceApi.ts: Request/response logs for analyze, chat, echoes, traits, patterns, image generation
- EditorEngine.ts: Cell merging debug logs, @ removal logs
- App.tsx: State change debug logs, auto-save success, migration success, new session creation

Kept important logs:
- All console.error statements (for debugging failures)
- Critical error handling logs

Benefits:
- Cleaner console output
- Reduced bundle size: 342.44 kB ‚Üí 341.30 kB (~1kB reduction)
- Easier to spot actual issues in production
